With the publication of this spurious memo, we are one big step closer to an epic constitutional clash, in which a beleaguered President, with the walls closing in on his family, his associates and himself, is pulling out all stops in self defense, no matter how crooked, and no matter what damage they do to the institutions of our country.
The only major question hanging over Devin Nunes is whether he has earned a footnote or an entire chapter as an ignominious figure in American history.
That is an easy challenge; it is not difficult to figure this one out.
